kalimat_besemah: Dege agi aku makan gulaiyan Nunung tu, kiraq benagh taghuq lumaiye dide mbasuh, laju ghegheji aku makane tadi

kalimat_inggris: I no longer want to eat dishes Nunung makes because she is slovenly and did not wash lumai vegetables, so I felt disgusted to eat it
